transcript: Pass up what? These little fish swim onto the beach, flop around, and then they swim away, and then they die.

segments.text: Pass up what? These little fish swim onto the beach, flop around, and then they swim away, and then they die.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Pass up what?  These little fish swim onto the beach, flop around and then they swim away.  And then they die.
